value.name: DC police fatally shoot man who raised BB gun at officers
value.description: Police identified the man as 63-year-old Sherman Evans of Washington. Police say the weapon Evans was holding was a BB gun. They did not release the races of the officers involved or that of Evans.

value.name: DC police release body camera footage of fatal shooting
value.description: Police have said 63-year-old Sherman Evans was holding a weapon that turned out to be a BB gun. The June 27 shooting is under investigation. The footage released Thursday shows officers with guns ...

value.name: SUV Runs off Interstate Near Farina, Injuring Passenger
value.description: A SUV ran off I-57 Tuesday afternoon, injuring a passenger in the vehicle. The crash was reported at 3:19pm about three miles north of Farina. Illinois State Police reported 75-year-old Sherman Evans of Gary,
